Reviews.Content: stayed nh manin nights january 2011 faithful experience below location canal grande aside santangelo stop boat stayed standard hotel suites actually view canal advance time probably noisy hear boats santangelo stop floor hotel preferred hotel location minutes walk rialto bridge san marco ponte campo san maurizio campo santo stefano close food shops bars restaurants nice quiet neighbourhood personnel hotel helpful cold night increase temperature heating run night nuisance air conditioningheating system noisy venice standards huge bed furniture bit below expectations breakfast plentiful basically real meal overall imo hotel attracting ratio

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: Oilfan4life
Reviews.Content: stayed couple nights leaving cruise venice getting hotel surprisingly easy waterbus stop 6 euros heard guests complaining water taxi 6070 euros isnt breakfast average european continental spreads explored map prevent walking circles takes 15mins marcs square rialto bridge view crummy hours beer door patio watched water action free internet nice unique city venice overall positive experience

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, Great location!”

Reviews.Content: hotel husband stayed honeymoon italy favorite hotel staff nice clean bed 2 twins pushed comfortable issues noise location perfect san marco plaza rialto market getting extremely easy line 1 ferry plaza roma train station san angelo stop front hotel considered staying jr suite unavailable stayed deluxe suite happier private balcony table 3 chairs faced grand canal note dont deluxe canal building jr suite balcony sit doors canal size hotels jr suite plenty days spent exploring venice breakfast buffet 3 hotels stayed 1 hour day wireless internet free pay overall definitely recommend hotel couples little pricey view location worth money
